Reviews.Title: “Always clean and welcoming”
Reviews.Author: paulabeara
Reviews.Content: This "home away from home" is always our choice when visiting the Dallas area. It is welcoming from the minute we drive up and walk in. The staff is friendly and helpful and the rooms are always clean -- a MUST for us!! The kitchens have recently been updated and have all the amenities you would need --- down to a corkscrew! We love the breakfast that is offered too -- this really is a plus when you are traveling with a family. I tried to think of any downsides to add, but cannot come up with any. We have chosen this Residence Inn over the past five years and will continue to do so when in the area.

Reviews.Title: “Best Hotel stay”
Reviews.Author: Mario Q
Reviews.Content: The service at this location, is The best around Dallas Tx. The front desk staff are well informed and knowledgeable in addition to being friendly and at tentative to your needs, the accommodations and service make you feel like home away from home. This location is strategically located to major freeways and best of all restaurants and eatery places. I have tried different hotel chains and none compare to this property. Breakfast and the evening complementary meals are great, specially when you are on a per diem basis.. From the front desk personnel to housekeeping, thank you for making my stay, a wonderful experience.

Reviews.Title: “The only place I stay when in Dallas.”
Reviews.Author: Davidh903
Reviews.Content: Been a home away from home for the past 2 years. Arrive on Sunday and leave on Friday and never had any problems with billing. Excellent personnel, clean rooms and by many restrauants.

Reviews.Title: “Very Nice Experience”
Reviews.Author: Vijay J
Reviews.Content: I came to visit a colleague staying here, and was persuaded by the Manager to shift into one of their suites. I moved in and did not regret it. The stay was extremely comfotable, and I felt so welcome in this place. The staff here is incredible. They genuinely care for each of their guests and this is what makes this place special. They treat their guests' guests as their own. I moved in as a guest and left as a friend!

Reviews.Title: “Best Business Travel Property Ever Location Great”
Reviews.Author: Peter S
Reviews.Content: This is one of the best properties I have ever stayed at. The service is always friendly and hotel is always clean. The nightly dinners during the week and daily breakfast are very good. Not to mention the nightly complimentary happy hour during the week. There are 50 great restaurants within walking distance of the hotel. It is great not to have to use the car in the evenings. They also provide a few shuttle service. The room is nice with flat screen TVs in most rooms. I have stayed at this property numerous times and would not consider staying at another property when in the area.

Reviews.Title: “Location and Staff is uncomparable”
Reviews.Author: EndyBOSTON
Reviews.Content: The location for this residence inn is great, right in the middle of shopping and plenty of places to eat around. Since I'm a Marriott gold member, I was upgraded to a 2-bedroom suite. The staff at check-in was great and helpful. Breakfast food is decent. The suite is in great condition too. I would definitely stop by again.

Reviews.Title: “Decent hotel, good location.”
Reviews.Author: I3ishop
Reviews.Content: I've stayed here 4 times and never had a single problem. The rooms are very big, housekeeping do an excellent job, the reception staff are friendly and helpful. There are plenty of bars and restaurants nearby, The whole hotel including the pool area is always kept clean. The breakfast isn't great, just the usual boring stuff, but they do offer free beers for 1hr in the evenings which is a nice touch.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel & Staff”
Reviews.Author: nb7754bax
Reviews.Content: Stayed here in a 1 bed suitewith facilities from 25th May to 2 June, 2011. Everything was great, very good value for its class. The staff are excellent, especially reception, always willing to accomodate requests and are happy in a genuine way. Rooms very good, very clean, good quality and tidy........maids even dishwashed 2 cups!! They will shop & deliver for you if you need to. Pool great, could do with more shades perhaps? Hotel ran free drinks and meals in the evening............great. No problems recommending this JW hotel and would stay again. Thanks to Wendy and her staff.

Reviews.Title: “There is a newer residence Inn about 5 miles away.”
Reviews.Author: hawa38
Reviews.Content: this hotel is old, still has the clunky tube tv, cleanliness is below average. all the female staff are nice except for this black dude who worked at the counter. had to deal with him twice on 2 different days but the same [--] attiture remained. 1st time he was unwilling to credit our stay to the marriot rewards point. then the next day he refused to honor the $30 gift card as stated on hotel.com. i had the hotel.com staff on the phone talking to him and he refused to talk to anyone on the phone. so hotel.com end up giving me the $30 as a credit towards my future stay. this man has failed to even pretend to be nice or professional, just plain rude. They also charge double for government rate compare to internet rate, that tells you something about how these people run business. breakfast was nice, standard residence inn hot breakfast, also evening snacks monday to thursday. we stay in residence inn a lot but will never go back there.

Reviews.Title: “Decent location with good facilities”
Reviews.Author: thewaterboy
Reviews.Content: I was on deputation for a couple of weeks to Grapevine, TX and was looking out for a decent home away from home; but not too far away from the uptown area of Dallas. The hotel was ideally located, great restaurants around; a decent mall as well and provided access to a 24 Hr fitness facility as well. It was easy to get on the freeway and get out to Grapevine as well as head into downtown Dallas as well. The outdoor pool was heated and large enough; and the rest of the creature comforts was in keeping with standard Residence Inn fare in the US. Functional without being spectacular. One problem though was roaches. I found one in one of my rooms; they got it sorted by pest control and I found one a few weeks later. It did gross me out...

Reviews.Title: “Very Nice Stay”
Reviews.Author: Desi2007
Reviews.Content: Stayed a week here. Very comfortable stay in a well-maintained property. The location was great with dining options galore in the Addison area. The staff was very helpful attending to every small need of ours. The complimentary breakfast was nice as well. The complimentary Wi-fi is a huge plus. Would definitely recommend it.

Reviews.Title: “Another Great Marriott Property”
Reviews.Author: zapataii
Reviews.Content: I spent 10 days at this property with my wife and son and have to say it is another good Residence Inn. We picked the location in Addison due to the great eating establishments surrounding the property, as well as the easy access to the Dallas North Tollway and main arteries. The staff was very friendly, from the front desk staff, the dining area staff and cleaning crew. The room was just as requested, a one room suite. I would have rated this stay as excellent but the furniture and carpet were a bit worn. The kitchen did have new stainless steel appliances, and the bed was quite comfortable. The only bummer is that no king size suites are offered at his property (maybe a residence inn policy?). Whether your are on business or pleasure, this is the place to stay. Hot breakfast in the morning, light dinner service Mon-Thur, outdoor pool and hot tub, it has it all. In terms of amenities, the exercise room was quite weak. Only an elliptical machine and 2 treadmills if I'm not mistaken. Overall a good property, would recommend to family and friends!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel for business travelers”
Reviews.Author: rogerm001
Reviews.Content: I recently stayed at this hotel for a 5 day business trip. I found this to be a great place to stay. I had a two room suite which was perfect for such a long duration. I had a full kitchen, living room, and bedroom which gave me plenty of room. Felt kind of like a home away from home. The hot breakfast each morning was very good and very convenient. I did not have time to attend the free meals in the evenings but they seemed well attended. The pool was nice and the hot tub was very relaxing, specially in the cold weather. If you've got kids with you, they have an outdoor basketball court available. The fitness room was kind of small and so I had trouble getting access to the equipment. I also ran into some trouble with my wireless card on my laptop but the hotel provided a wireless adapter kit so I was good to go. This hotel is located one block from Belt Line Rd. which is lined with good restaurants, many within walking distance. Also the proximity to the Galleria and Lincoln Centre made this hotel especially attractive.

Reviews.Title: “Very Well Done”
Reviews.Author: KSnj
Reviews.Content: I was a little concerned when I'd read that this was an older property but nothing about my room or the public spaces said old. In fact, I might have guessed this was a newer property. Rooms are spacious and clean. Bath area is spacious and showers are good (though I'm not crazy about the brand of shampoo/conditioner provided at Residence Inns). Mattress is comfortable and bedding is of the "better" kind. Commercial sprawl from the nearby mall provides tons of dining and shopping choices with a number of highly rated restaurants nearby. Breakfast was very good (hot and cold buffet) and the food served at evening cocktail hours was unusually good (enough to get you by for the evening if all you're looking for is a light meal with a salad).

Reviews.Title: “Great for the Holidays”
Reviews.Author: LouisianaChris
Reviews.Content: The hotel, staff, and service were excellent. We were away from home for the holidays, but the hotel made our holiday experience just lovely. Everything we asked for or needed, the staff provided for us quickly and with a smile. Rather than having a blue hoiday, we were able to have a wonderful Christmas celebration, thanks to the hotel and its staff.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent stay at the Residence Inn in Addison”
Reviews.Author: txtrekkers
Reviews.Content: We had an excellent one night stay... our studio suite was roomy... smelled clean... livingroom/kitchen provided plenty of room for the two of us. The queen sized bed was comfortable... quiet room, even though close to the Addison airport & restaurant row... nice layout in bathroom with lavoratory separate from the commode & shower/tub.. water pressure was great... nice showerhead & shower curtain rod was curved so water wouldn't leak out of the tub while showering...EXCELLENT BREAKFAST BUFFET-- offered eggs, sausage, french toast & waffles, yogurt, medley of thawed berries, granola, juices, milk, coffee, tea, pastries & cereal... It is within walking distance to many restaurants & Addison Circle Park. We walked to the park to view the Labor Day fireworks! We will definitely stay here again... the staff were friendly with easy check-in and check out.

HotelInfo.Name: Residence Inn Dallas Addison/Quorum Drive
HotelInfo.Address: 14975 Quorum Drive, Dallas, TX 75240
